original_text: This is the word that came unto Jeremiah from the Lord, after that the king Zedekiah had made a covenant with all the people which were at Jerusalem, to proclaim liberty unto them;
korean_text: 시드기야 왕이 예루살렘에 있는 모든 백성과 한 가지로 하나님 앞에서 계약을 맺고 자유를 선포한 후에 여호와께로부터 말씀이 예레미야에게 임하니라

sentences.original_text: that came unto Jeremiah from the Lord
after that king Zedekiah had made a covenant
sentences.korean_translation: 그 후에 스드기야 왕이 언약을 맺었는데

sentences.original_text: with all the people which were at Jerusalem
